attacks.name: Spore
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dynamic Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

ability.name: Beating Wings
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), If Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it in your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Meditate
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Wave
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Returning Flames
attacks.text: Put 2 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Mat Block
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Paint Roller
text: Discard any Stadium card in play. Then, draw a card.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Hard Bite
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Wicked Jab
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Deep Sea Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

cards.name: Baltoy
text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Future Spin
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

cards.name: Trevenant-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dark Forest
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Wood Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Farewell Letter
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it (this does not count as a Knock Out). If you do, draw a card.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to self.

attacks.name: Continuous Slash
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Power Heater
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokémon.

cards.name: Lucky Helmet
text: Whenever the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), draw 2 cards.

ability.name: Barrier Shrine
ability.text: Each player can't play any Stadium cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

cards.name: Captivating Poké Puff
text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Put any number of Basic Pokémon you find there onto your opponent's Bench.

attacks.name: Karate Chop
attacks.text: Does 50 damage minus 10 for each damage counter on Machoke.

attacks.name: Submission
attacks.text: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Healing Wave
attacks.text: Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 90 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Double Stomp
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Draining Kiss
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Flame Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Entangling Control
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Trash Tentacle
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sitdown Splash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Cotton Bed
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Donphan.

attacks.name: Rapid Spin
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with his or her Active Pokémon, then, if you have any Benched Pokémon, you switch 1 of them with your Active Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Multiply
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Kakuna and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Energy Restore
text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, put a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand. If you don't have that many basic Energy cards in your discard pile, put all of them into your hand.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

ancientTrait.name: Ω Barrage
ancientTrait.text: This Pokémon may attack twice a turn. (If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent's Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flare Bonus
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Master Ball
text: Look at 7 cards from the top of your deck. You may choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from those cards, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

attacks.name: Ultimate Blade
attacks.text: If the damage from this attack reduces your opponent's Active Pokémon's HP to 60 or less, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Data Check
attacks.text: Look through your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Lysandre
text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

cards.name: Crushing Hammer
text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Poké Ball
text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokémon Catcher
text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Mirage Stadium
text: Whenever a player tries to Retreat a Pokémon during his or her turn, that player flips a coin. If heads, that player retreats that Pokémon (and discards Energy normally). If tails, that Pokémon can't Retreat this turn (the player doesn't discard any Energy).

attacks.name: Fairy Power
attacks.text: Return 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Sudden Sting
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Kakuna during this turn, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

ability.name: Mega Boost
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.

cards.name: Eco Arm
text: Shuffle 3 Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Energy Recycler
text: Shuffle 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Forest of Giant Plants
text: Each player's Grass Pokémon can evolve during his or her first turn or the turn he or she plays those Pokémon.

cards.name: Level Ball
text: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Camerupt-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Explosive Jet
attacks.text: Discard as many Fire Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Ice Block
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Cell Storm
attacks.text: Discard 2 Psychic Energy attached to Deoxys and remove 6 damage counters from Deoxys.

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

cards.name: Kyurem-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Glaciate
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Icecalibur
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Dark Provide
attacks.text: Attach up to 1 Grass or Darkness Energy card from your hand to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Poison
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

cards.name: Flash Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Lightning Pokémon. This card provides Lightning Energy only while this card is attached to a Lightning Pokémon. The Lightning Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Lightning Pokémon, discard this card.)

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Knockout Needle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Sand-attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Solar Suggestion
attacks.text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokémon to any of your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sucker Punch
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

ability.name: Flare Command
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

ability.name: Primal Pull
ability.text: As long as Claydol is your Active Pokémon, each player's Evolved Pokémon pays Colorless more Energy to use its attacks."

attacks.name: Muddy Eye
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of basic Energy cards attached to Claydol and the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

attacks.name: Vanish
attacks.text: Shuffle Abra into your deck. (Discard all cards attached to Abra.)

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
